tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculptures_feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_reviewed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT NOT NULL,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    material VARCHAR(50),
    year_created INT
);

CREATE TABLE Sculptures ( 
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sculpture_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    artist_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    year_created INT NOT NULL, 
    material TEXT NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews ( 
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sculpture_id INT NOT NULL, 
    reviewer_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    rating INT NOT NULL, 
    review_text TEXT NOT NULL, 
    review_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year_created INTEGER,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INTEGER REFERENCES sculptures(id),
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    rating INTEGER CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
    comment TEXT,
    date_reviewed TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sculptors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    nationality VARCHAR(255),
    style VARCHAR(255),
    dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE acquisitions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INTEGER REFERENCES sculptures(id),
    acquisition_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE SculptureFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureInfo (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(100),
    artist_name VARCHAR(100),
    sculpture_material VARCHAR(50),
    acquisition_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureDisplay (
    display_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    display_location VARCHAR(50),
    display_date_start DATE,
    display_date_end DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureAcquisition (
    acquisition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    acquisition_source VARCHAR(100),
    acquisition_date DATE,
    acquisition_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
